verse:
यदा सर्वे प्रमुच्यन्ते कामा येऽस्य हृदि श्रिताः।
अथ मर्त्योऽमृतो भवत्यत्र ब्रह्म समश्नुते ॥
meaning: Meaning:When all desires residing in the heart of a person are released, then that mortal being becomes immortal and attains the state of Brahman in this world.

upanishad-org.meaning: When every desire that harboureth in the heart of a man hath been loosened from its moorings, then this mortal putteth on immortality; even here he enjoyeth Brahman in this human body.
